page.title: 08Employment
page.content: The results of survey on paid employment in pupils' families :- MALE{FEMALE Full Time Employment Only.. 85%{* 13% Full Time + Part Time...... 14%{* 6% P.T.Employment Only........ 1%{* 47% Unemployed ................ 0% {Housewife.................. * 34% Children Under 11/Part Time 2%{* 6% Children Over 11/ Part Time 38%{* 18% {Parents' jobs in 1985 are:}Shops,10: Farmers,10:Teachers,8: Typists,8: Factory Workers,7:Salesmen,5: Playschool Helpers,5:Accountants,4: Entertainments,4:Printers,3. {In 1935,Frisby School Admission {Register lists Parents jobs as :-} Farmers,8: Foundry Workers,7: Labourers,7: Brick Layers,3: Railway Workers,3:Farm Labourers,3: Brewery Labourers,2:Domestic Servants,2:Road Man,1:Others,5.{
